title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Project-Based Learning for Activating Online Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners actively participate in online communities at least three times a week for four weeks, engaging in discussions and resource-sharing activities.
Learners submit at least two collaborative project deliverables using a reward system.
Learners understand the role-sharing system within the community and perform the role of team project leader at least once.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
